types.description: Check a given URL to see if there's update available. Outputs version found on URL, or a raw JSON object containing more information found, like hash of new file or URL to get it, to be used to get the file.

in_ports.description: Start a check on current URL to see if update is available.
in_ports.name: CHECK

in_ports.description: Cancel an ongoing check operation. No output packets shall be sent, unless a new CHECK is issued
in_ports.name: CANCEL

in_ports.description: Causes task current progress to be sent to PROGRESS port
in_ports.name: GET_PROGRESS

types.name: update/check

out_ports.description: Raw update information got from URL. Is a JSON containing, at least, URL of update file, its hash and hash algorithm used, besides its version. This one should be passed as UPDATE_INFO to update/fetch node.
out_ports.name: UPDATE_INFO

out_ports.description: Current progress of task, a number between 0 and 100. An output of -1 indicates that current progress is not available
out_ports.name: PROGRESS

types.description: Fetch an update file using given update information. If eveything goes well, it should output path of update file, to be used by update/install node.

in_ports.description: JSON object contaning information about how to fetch update file. It can be obtained via update/check node
in_ports.name: UPDATE_INFO

in_ports.description: Cancel an ongoing fetch operation. No output packets shall be sent, unless a new FETCH is issued
in_ports.name: CANCEL

in_ports.description: Causes task current progress to be sent to PROGRESS port
in_ports.name: GET_PROGRESS

types.name: update/fetch

out_ports.description: Path of update file. This one should be passed as FILE_PATH to update/install
out_ports.name: FILE_PATH

out_ports.description: Current progress of task, a number between 0 and 100. An output of -1 indicates that current progress is not available
out_ports.name: PROGRESS

types.description: Install update. Process of installing update depends on current underlying update module.

in_ports.description: Path of update file to be installed. Can be the one got via update/fetch node
in_ports.name: FILE_PATH

in_ports.description: Cancel an ongoing install operation. Note that this is dependent on current underlying update module and may not be possible.
in_ports.name: CANCEL

in_ports.description: Causes task current progress to be sent to PROGRESS port
in_ports.name: GET_PROGRESS

types.name: update/install

members.description: Path of update file to be installed
members.name: file_path

out_ports.description: If install completed successfuly, sends true, false otherwise. Note that errors packet may be sent in case of failure
out_ports.name: SUCCESS

out_ports.description: Current progress of task, a number between 0 and 100. An output of -1 indicates that current progress is not available
out_ports.name: PROGRESS
